revised_title: Fiery Exhalation in Merionydh-Shire: An Account by Edw. Lhwyd
tldr: Edw. Lhwyd reports on a fiery exhalation in Merionydh-Shire, its origin from a place called Morva bychan, and its impact on local livestock. He also mentions that loud noises can repel the exhalation, reducing losses in that area.
